item.title: Text-Network Analysis of White & Black Soldiers
item.description: /* this chunnk of code centers all of the headings */ h1, h2, h3 { text-align: center; } Social Network Analysis Gephi Networks Social Networks with Unionized Terminology Something that is important to us is soldiers' dicussions of inner-outer groups of people. A way that we decided to look at that was by unionizing biterms. For example, a naive co-occurence with "black" may be "people" but we care about the dicussion of "black people" rather than just the identification of "people" as co-occurring with the word "black".
